ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 128 units x 1880 ops/unit/clock = 240,640 INT8 ops/clock (HVX + AI tensor accelerators)
ops_per_clock_notes.note: Heterogeneous platform: 8x HVX SIMD + 16 dedicated AI tensor accelerator units. 4nm TSMC automotive.

theoretical_peaks_notes: 700 TOPS INT8 peak @ 130W (Qualcomm marketing). Sustained ~350-420 TOPS at 50-60% efficiency. Scalable to 2000 TOPS multi-chip.
notes: High-end autonomous driving platform. ASIL D certified. 4nm TSMC automotive. Hexagon DSP + dedicated AI accelerators. For L3/L4/L5 AV and robotaxi. Liquid cooling. Expected vehicles 2025-2026.
